Package com.izforge.izpack.panels

Interface Summary
PacksPanelInterface This interface is used to be able to access the common information in the PackPanel and the ImgPacksPAnel through a common type.
ProcessingClient Implement this interface in any class that wants to use processing or validation services.
Processor Interface for classes that provide input field processing services.
Validator Interface for classes that provide rule validation services.
 

Class Summary
CheckBoxNode The model structure for a JTree node.
CheckBoxNodeRenderer The renderer model for individual checkbox nodes in a JTree.
CheckedHelloPanel An extended hello panel class which detects whether the product was already installed or not.
